caption.p: Module analysis of the non-functioning pituitary adenoma-related lncRNA-mRNA network using Molecular Complex Detection. (A-C) lncRNA-mRNA interactions in three modules and pathway enrichment of protein-coding genes in each corresponding module. (A) Module 1, (B) Module 2 and (C) Module 3. Square nodes represent lncRNAs, and elliptical nodes represent mRNAs. Red indicates upregulation and green indicates downregulation. lnc, long non-coding.
